title: BRIEF-Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.5 Million Versus $15.1 Million In 2016 ‍​
text: March 16, 2018 / 7:45 PM / Updated 29 minutes ago BRIEF-Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.5 Million Versus $15.1 Million In 2016 ‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 16 (Reuters) - Boeing Co: * BOEING SAYS CEO DENNIS MUILENBURG’S TOTAL COMPENSATION FOR 2017 WAS $18.5 MILLION VERSUS $15.1 MILLION IN 2016 ‍​- SEC FILING * BOEING SAYS CFO GREGORY SMITH‍​'S FY 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $17.2 MILLION Source text : [ bit.ly/2Dy4BkW ] Further company coverage:
